name: Aiden's Adventure
description:
An exciting adventure game in which the player navigates across worlds to pursue love. 

Just as our hero, Aiden, approaches Sylvestina, the girl of his dreams, to confess his love, she is sucked away by a portal that carries her across galaxies. Aiden follows her into a cave and jumps between similar portals, searching for Sylvestina along the way.  While fighting extraterrestrials and navigating different settings, Aiden must switch between the 2nd and 3rd dimensions to reveal the correct path.

Made by: Anish Jupudy, Andrew Yu, Shreya Nair, Raghav Iyer, Siddharth Germilla, Cecilia Romero - High Schoolers at Dougherty Valley High School
